about.title: About
about.content: I lead AI transformation initiatives at AXA, helping engineering teams adopt AI-powered development workflows at scale. With 17+ years in software engineering, I specialize in bridging the gap between cutting-edge AI capabilities and enterprise-grade implementation.

speaking.title: Speaking
speaking.availability: Available for keynotes, workshops, panels, podcasts, and executive briefings
speaking.languages: I present in English, French, Portuguese, and Spanish.
